name: Team Yamanekko's Archives
body:
Team Yamanekko have developed mruby applications and development tools for mruby.

![Chi-chan](https://1.gravatar.com/avatar/644ee43c84fe676bbbdb658691b373ac?s=150)

# Our Repositories
- mruby forked version: https://github.com/yamanekko/mruby
   - RubyConf 2013 edition(based 3a668241bead3 , 26 Oct 2013): https://github.com/yamanekko/mruby/tree/rubyconf
- Raspberry Pi sample: https://github.com/yamanekko/raspberrypi
- STM32F4 Discovery sample: (TBD.)
- Other repositories: https://github.com/yamanekko/

# Our Slides
- How to control physical devices with mruby (at RubyConf 2013): http://www.slideshare.net/yamanekko/rubyconf2013
- 使用Eclipse快樂的mruby開發 (OSDC.tw 2013): http://www.slideshare.net/yamanekko/eclipsemruby
- mruby for embedded systems (Tokyu RubyKaigi 05): http://www.slideshare.net/yamanekko/tokyurubykaigi05
- Other Slides: https://www.slideshare.net/yamanekko/

# Our Members
- Yurie Yamane ([@yuri_at_earth](http://twitter.com/yuri_at_earth))
- Masayoshi Takahashi ([@takahashim](http://twitter.com/takahashim))
- Chi-chan
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
